name: JQ: cosmos
description:
JQ: cosmos - this is a quiz game about space.
In this game you are expected by questions on 3 subjects: planets, astronauts and constellations, and also 2 mini-games with endless gameplay: "What planet is bigger?"and "Which planet is closer to the sun?". Choose the correct answer among the 4 options offered to pass the next level.
Features:
  • 50+ levels
  • 3 main themes and 2 mini-games with endless gameplay
  • Interesting soundtrack
  • Steam Achievements
Credits: This game was created using Clickteam Fusion 2.5! Music by Erwarda Savitnaag.
